long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Censor Words - Keep Your Browsing Safe and Family-Friendly

Introducing Censor Words, a must-have Chrome extension crafted to create a positive, respectful, and family-safe online experience for everyone. Whether you're browsing solo, sharing a device with family, or protecting young ones, Censor Words gives you full control to filter out unwanted or offensive language so your browsing stays as clean as you want it to be.

Why You'll Love Censor Words:

✨ Automatic Language Filtering
Let Censor Words handle it all – it automatically filters out a predefined list of inappropriate words and replaces them with suitable alternatives, ensuring you encounter only the content you choose to see.

✨ Personalized Censorship
Take control by customizing your censorship list. Add words or phrases that matter to you, and decide on the replacements. You’re in the driver’s seat, curating the browsing experience that’s right for you.

✨ Effortless Control
Activate or deactivate the filter with a single click. Tailor your settings in moments, and make adjustments anytime on the easy-to-use settings page.

✨ On-the-Go Toggle
Quickly switch censorship on or off as needed. Whether it's for work, family, or your own peace of mind, your browsing environment adjusts to fit.

Getting Started is Simple:

    Install Censor Words and tap the toolbar icon to dive into the settings.
    Customize your censorship list by adding words and selecting your preferred replacements.
    Enable or disable the censorship feature with ease.
    Enjoy a cleaner, safer, and more positive web experience instantly!

Keep the web exactly how you want it with Censor Words – a seamless way to browse without surprises. Download today and enjoy a safer, respectful online space wherever you go.
